name: PostOperativeFollowUp
title: Post operative follow up
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values is intended to capture a post-operative visit where a certain procedure, such as scleral depression would not be done.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to attribute.),(Inclusion Criteria: Included are values to capture a post-operative visit, such that a retina specialists would use.),(Exclusion Criteria: Post-operative visits not typically used by retina specialists.)

concept.display: Postoperative follow-up visit, normally included in the surgical package, to indicate that an evaluation and management service was performed during a postoperative period for a reason(s) related to the original procedure

contains.display: Postoperative follow-up visit, normally included in the surgical package, to indicate that an evaluation and management service was performed during a postoperative period for a reason(s) related to the original procedure
